title: Texas high court says governor cannot order transgender child investigations - Reuters
content:
1. Texas high court says governor cannot order transgender child investigations  Reuters
  2. Texas allows investigations of trans families to continue. Here's what it means for both sides.  KHOU 11
  3. Mixed Texas ruling allows investigations into parents of trans youth  CBS News
  4. These parents didn't embrace gender-affirming care. Texas investigated them  The Dallas Morning News
  5. Texas can continue investigating families seeking gender-affirming care for their transgender children, state Supreme Court says  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Texas Supreme Court on Friday ruled that neither Governor Greg Abbott nor the state's attorney general had the authority to order child abuse investigations of families that provide certain medical treatment for their transgender children.
